p: Subsequently, a retrospective investigation of SeACoV at 45 pig farms from Guangdong province based on 236 diarrhea samples showed that SeACoV had emerged in Guangdong at least as early as August 2016 ( Zhou et al., 2018a). This study also determined two additional genomic sequences CN/GDGL/2017 and CN/GDLS/2017 (MG605090 and MG605091) that shared nearly 100 % nt identity with the sequence CN/GDWT/2017 (MG557844) based on our analysis ( Fig. 3).
